itemDescription: British Royal Navy officer and Chief Press Censor

wikipedia_page.main: George Pirie Thomson (1887–1965) was a Royal Navy officer. He is most well known for his work as Britain's Chief Press Censor during the Second World War.

response: * George Pirie Thomson (1887–1965), British naval officer and press censor
